text.value:
SELECT AUDIT_LOG_ID ,PROCESS_STATUS FROM 
META_RAW.PROCESS_AUDIT_LOG 
WHERE JOB_NAME = '@{pipeline().Pipeline}' 
AND CATEGORY = '@{pipeline().parameters.category}' 
AND DATEDIFF(s, to_timestamp(moment), CONVERT_TIMEZONE( 'Asia/Singapore' , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())) < 43200 
QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AUDIT_LOG_ID DESC) =1;

query.value:
WITH AUDIT_LOG AS
(
    SELECT MAX(MOMENT) MOMENT,PROCESS_ID 
    FROM META_RAW.PROCESS_AUDIT_LOG 
    GROUP BY PROCESS_ID
) 
SELECT 
    DEP_USECASE.CATEGORY, 
    LISTAGG(DISTINCT DEP_PROC.PROCESS_ID,',') AS SUCCESSORS
FROM META_RAW.PROCESS DEP_PROC
CROSS JOIN TABLE(SPLIT_TO_TABLE(NULLIF(TRIM(DEP_PROC.DEPENDS_ON),''),',')) DEP_JOBS
JOIN META_RAW.USECASE DEP_USECASE ON DEP_PROC.USECASE_ID = DEP_USECASE.USECASE_ID
LEFT JOIN AUDIT_LOG DEP_AUDIT ON DEP_PROC.PROCESS_ID  = DEP_AUDIT.PROCESS_ID
JOIN META_RAW.PROCESS CUR_PROC
ON DEP_JOBS.VALUE = CUR_PROC.PROCESS_ID
JOIN META_RAW.USECASE CUR_USECASE
ON  CUR_PROC.USECASE_ID = CUR_USECASE.USECASE_ID
LEFT JOIN AUDIT_LOG CUR_AUDIT ON CUR_PROC.PROCESS_ID  = CUR_AUDIT.PROCESS_ID
WHERE CUR_USECASE.CATEGORY = '@{pipeline().parameters.category}' AND DEP_AUDIT.MOMENT<CUR_AUDIT.MOMENT
GROUP BY DEP_USECASE.CATEGORY

text.value:
alter session set  timezone ='Asia/Singapore';
SET DURATION =(
SELECT DATEDIFF(s, MOMENT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
FROM META_RAW.PROCESS_AUDIT_LOG WHERE RUN_ID='@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.runid, null),'',pipeline().parameters.runid)}');

INSERT INTO META_RAW.PROCESS_AUDIT_LOG
(
PROCESS_ID,
PHASE_ID,
MOMENT,
DURATION,
PIPELINE_ID,
RUN_ID,
JOB_NAME,
MESSAGE,
PROCESS_STATUS,
INPUT_ROW_COUNT,
OUTPUT_ROW_COUNT,
CATEGORY,
USECASE_ID
)
VALUES
(
@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.process_id, null),0,pipeline().parameters.process_id)},
@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.phase_id, null),0,pipeline().parameters.phase_id)},
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
$DURATION,
'@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.pipeline_id, null),0,pipeline().parameters.pipeline_id)}',
'@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.runid, null),'',pipeline().parameters.runid)}',
'@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.jobname, null),'',pipeline().parameters.jobname)}',
'@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.message, null),'',pipeline().parameters.message)}',
TRIM(UPPER('@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.status, null),'',pipeline().parameters.status)}')),
@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.input_row_count, null),0,pipeline().parameters.input_row_count)},
@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.output_row_count, null),0,pipeline().parameters.output_row_count)},
'@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.category, null),'',pipeline().parameters.category)}',
@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.usecase_id, null),0,pipeline().parameters.usecase_id)}
);

alter session set  timezone ='Asia/Singapore';
INSERT INTO META_RAW.ERROR_LOG (
    PROCESS_ID,
    PHASE_ID,
    MOMENT,
    RUN_ID,
    JOB_ID,
    JOB_NAME,
    ERROR_MESSAGE,
    ERROR_CODE,
    CATEGORY
) VALUES (
    @{pipeline().parameters.process_id},
    @{pipeline().parameters.phase_id},
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    '@{pipeline().parameters.run_id}',
    '@{pipeline().parameters.job_id}',
    '@{pipeline().parameters.job_name}',
    '@{replace(pipeline().parameters.error_message,'''','''''')}',
    '@{pipeline().parameters.error_code}',
    '@{pipeline().parameters.category}'
);

Select 
"'jobId'" AS jobId,
"'accountId'" AS accountId,
"'waitTime'" AS waitTime,
"'transformationType'" AS transformationType,
"'tempId'" AS tempId,
"'container'" AS container
from (SELECT PARAMETERS.PARAMETER_NAME,PARAMETER_VALUE,PARAMETER_GROUP_NAME,IS_SENSITIVE
FROM META_RAW.PARAMETERS 
JOIN META_RAW.PROCESS USING (PARAMETER_GROUP_ID)
WHERE PROCESS_ID = @{pipeline().parameters.process_id}
AND IS_ACTIVE = TRUE)
as A pivot ( MAX (PARAMETER_VALUE) for PARAMETER_NAME in (
'jobId',
'accountId',
'waitTime',
'transformationType',
'tempId',
'container'
));

query.value:
Select SNOWFLAKE_STAGE,IS_INCREMENTAL,WATERMARK_VALUE,
"'container'" AS container,
"'landing_file_path'" AS landing_file_path,
"'landing_file_name'" AS landing_file_name,
"'target_table'" AS target_table,
"'target_schema'" AS target_schema,
REPLACE(CASE WHEN IS_INCREMENTAL = TRUE AND WATERMARK_VALUE IS NOT NULL
THEN
    CONCAT("'ms_query'",' ',REPLACE(ifnull("'incremental_filter'",''), '{WATERMARK_VALUE}', WATERMARK_VALUE))
ELSE    "'ms_query'" END, '{JOB_START_TIME}', '@{formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime,'UTC','Singapore Standard Time'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}') AS ms_query,
"'truncate_and_load'" AS truncate_and_load,
"'decide_source'" AS decide_source,
ifnull("'param_list'",'') AS param_list,
"'param_query'" AS param_query,
lower(ifnull("'load_method'",'copy')) AS load_method,
"'sp_name'" AS SP_NAME,
"'next_incremental_value'" AS next_incremental_value,
ifnull("'map_names'",'N') AS map_names,
ifnull("'extract_month'",'0') AS extract_month
from (SELECT PARAMETERS.PARAMETER_NAME,PARAMETER_VALUE,PARAMETER_GROUP_NAME,IS_SENSITIVE,SNOWFLAKE_STAGE, SNOWFLAKE_FILE_FORMAT, IS_INCREMENTAL,WATERMARK_VALUE
FROM META_RAW.PARAMETERS 
JOIN META_RAW.PROCESS P USING (PARAMETER_GROUP_ID)
LEFT JOIN (SELECT PROCESS_ID,WATERMARK_VALUE FROM META_RAW.INCREMENTAL_WATERMARK
WHERE PROCESS_ID = @{pipeline().parameters.process_id}
AND LOAD_STATUS = 'SUCCESS'
QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY PROCESS_ID ORDER BY INSERT_TIMESTAMP DESC) = 1) I USING(PROCESS_ID)
WHERE PROCESS_ID = @{pipeline().parameters.process_id}
AND IS_ACTIVE = TRUE)
as A pivot ( MAX (PARAMETER_VALUE) for PARAMETER_NAME in (
'container',
'landing_file_path',
'landing_file_name',
'target_table',
'target_schema',
'ms_query',
'truncate_and_load',
'decide_source',
'param_list',
'param_query',
'incremental_filter',
'load_method',
'sp_name',
'next_incremental_value',
'map_names',
'extract_month'
));

text.value:
select
	case
		when lower(column_name) = 'id' then 'JPDCLEDW_INTEGRATION.encryption(ID)  as ID '
		else column_name 
	end as column_name
from
	(select	column_name, ordinal_position	from  INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE table_name = '@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].tableName}' and lower(column_name) not in (@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].excludedColumns}) order by	ordinal_position asc )
